#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define _ ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define pob pop_back
#define pf push_front
#define pof pop_front
#define mp make_pair
#define all(a) a.begin(),a.end()
#define bitcnt(x) __builtin_popcountll(x)
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAXN 500005
#define BASE 31
#define BLOCK 250
#define eps 1e-9
typedef unsigned long long int uint64;
typedef long long int int64;

string s;

int main(){
	int t,d,i;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		cin>>s>>d;
		int l=s.length();
		for(i=d-1;i<l;i++)
		printf("%c",s[i]);
		l=l-d+1;
		if(l&1){
			for(i=d-2;i>=0;i--)
			printf("%c",s[i]);
		}
		else{
			for(i=0;i<d-1;i++)
			printf("%c",s[i]);
		}
		printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
